title: Miley Cyrus shows off her DIY hospital gown makeover after being laid up with tonsillitis
text:
CLOSE Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth have called it quits less than a year into their marriage, 10 years after meeting on a movie set. USA TODAY

Miley Cyrus is asking for a "dose of bad ass" after being hospitalized.

The "Wrecking Ball" singer, 26, revealed on her Instagram Story Tuesday that she's in the hospital recovering from tonsillitis and may miss an upcoming commitment.

"Trying to heal as quick as I can to make it to Gorillapalooza w @TheEllenShow @PortiaDeRossi @BrunoMars this weekend!" Cyrus wrote alongside a picture of herself lying in a hospital bed connected to an IV.

She's referring to Saturday's Gorillapalooza, a charity concert put on by The Ellen Fund to raise money for gorilla conservation. The Hollywood event is sold out.

"Send goooooood vibes my way!" Cyrus added. "Hoping the Rock star G*DS send me a boost of bad ass and help me kick this (expletive) to the cub where it belongs. We got gorillas to save!"

'Get used to me dating': Miley Cyrus slams slut-shaming critics after Cody Simpson kiss

.@MileyCyrus is currently hospitalized 🤒 Hope you feel better for Gorillapalooza (a Charity event) this weekend ❤️💉 pic.twitter.com/GSYlWZXagc — Miley Cyrus Access (@MileyNewsAccess) October 8, 2019

Cyrus appeared to be in good spirits during her hospital stay, redesigning her standard gown to a more fashionable "punk rock baby doll halter" version and getting a makeover from her mom, Tish Cyrus.

.@MileyCyrus redesigned her hospital gown and made it fashion 👗 pic.twitter.com/rAPuauUfFd — Miley Cyrus Access (@MileyNewsAccess) October 8, 2019

"How you present yourself can determine how you feel!" Cyrus said in another post. "Thank you mama for helpin this little sickyyy look a little bit better by brushin my hair for me."

She added, "Mommy’s are the best!"

Moms are the best! While @MileyCyrus is in the hospital fighting off whatever sickeness she has, her mom @tishcyrus made her feel better by brushing her hair ❤️ get well soon Miley! pic.twitter.com/s8ghnjuP84 — Miley Cyrus Access (@MileyNewsAccess) October 8, 2019

Cyrus' mother wasn't the only one to send her love. The singer was showered with rose petals and received a delivery of flowers and balloons.

description: Miley Cyrus is asking for a "dose of bad ass" after being hospitalized. She's hoping to beat her tonsillitis in time for Gorillapalooza this weekend.
